div.head: 便癰
div.div: obstruction-illness [in the region] of [urination and defecation] relief

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: obstruction-illness [in the region] of [urination and defecation] relief

sense.def: Alternative Names xue shan 血疝 , blood elevation-illness. Pathological Condition identical with bian du 便毒 , poison [in the region] of relief. Ru men shi qin 儒門事親 4: 言 於大便處害一癰，故名便癰也 , “That is to say: a harmful obstruction-illness at the location where major relief takes place (i.e. defecation). Hence it is called ‘ obstruction-illness [in the region] of relief ’”.
